result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kenneth C Love

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court, in custody.  Attorney Melissa Jane Fitzsimmons Ms appeared as a Friend of the Court. Attorney Jacob Daniel Corr in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status of Counsel hearing with Defendant's other Case, 21CF142. Conference held in chambers. Discussion placed on the record. Public Defender's Office has NOT been able to appoint counsel for Defendant. Court ordered case adjourned for Status of Counsel and Bail/Bond hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Status of Counsel and Bail/Bond hearing scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 08:30 am. Hearing will be held IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
-received and filed.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court, in custody.  Attorney Amanda M. Parent not in Court.  Attorney Colleen Cullen appeared as a Friend of the Court. Attorney Jacob Daniel Corr in Court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status hearing. Defendant also has Case 21CF142 scheduled today for trial. Discussion placed on the record. Attorney Parent no longer works for the Public Defender's Office, and the Public Defender's Office failed to appoint new counsel for Mr. Love. Court ordered case adjourned for Status of Counsel hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Clerk provided information to the Public Defender's Office. 

Status of Counsel hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am. Hearing will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Kenneth C Love appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Amanda M. Parent appeared by video for Kenneth C Love.  Attorney Jacob Daniel Corr appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Final PreTrial with Defendant's other Case, 21CF142. Discussion placed on the record. Case remains in trial posture. State advised the Court that cases are NOT JOINED for trial, and State will try case 21CF142 first. No additional issues need to be addressed at this time. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 
Status hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am. Hearing will be held IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
Defense Motion in Limine; received and filed.
State's Witness List; received and filed.
State's Motion in Limine; received and filed.

Defense contacted the Court and State via email regarding Status hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022.
Per agreement of the parties, Court VACATED Status hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022. 
Clerk provided information to MCSO.

Defense counsel requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing, Final PreTrial, and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Status hearing scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:45 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference. 
Final PreTrial scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 08:30 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.
Jury Trial scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Motion hearing. Defendant also has Case 21CF142 scheduled today for Status and Case 22CF2859 scheduled for Initial Appearance. Court reviewed Defense Motion to Suppress. Conference held in chambers. Discussion placed on the record. Parties agreed that no police officer can testify regarding identifying Defendant in the video. Scheduling Conference proceeded.
Filed: Original Transcript of PRELIMINARY HEARING ( 13 pages) commencing 1-11-2022 by SANDRA M. KANDZIORA.
Report dated May 1, 2022 from Ronald Guzek, Video Surveillance Image and Audio Expert; received, filed, and forwarded to the Judge for review.
NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION TO SUPPRESS IDENTIFICATION; received, filed, and forwarded to the Judge for review.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Status hearing with Defendant's other case. State and Defense appeared in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Defendant appeared via Zoom Video Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Defense provided an update regarding investigator's report. Court set the following deadlines: Defense Motion due on or before June 24, 2022. State's Response due on or before July 18, 2022. Court ordered case adjourned for Motion hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Motion hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 03:00 pm. Parties must appear IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Investigator will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Defendant also has Case 21CF142 scheduled today for Jury Status hearing. State and Defense appeared in Room 113 of the Safety Building. Defendant appeared via Zoom Video Conference. Defense provided an update to the Court and requested an adjournment. State did not object. Court held colloquy with Defendant. Court granted Defense request. Court VACATED SPEEDY Jury Trial date of May 9, 2022. Defense requested Case 21CF142 be set for Status hearing and Case 22CF6 be set for Motion hearing. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Status hearing scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 09:30 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference. 
Motion hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 03:00 pm. Hearing will be held IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building. DEFENDANT WILL BE PRODUCED.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference with Defendant's other Case, 21CF142. Discussion placed on the record. Defense Expert did not appear for today's hearing to provide his availability for Motion hearing. Defense requested an adjournment. State did not object. Court granted request. Case adjourned for Scheduling Conference, Branch 46. Scheduling Conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 11:00 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference. SPEEDY Jury Trial scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Scheduling Conference scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 08:45 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Expires June 13, 2022.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**
Case in Court for Bail/Bond hearing. Defendant also has Case 21CF142 pending in Branch 46. Discussion placed on the record. State complied with Victim Notification. Arguments heard. For reasons stated on record, Court DENIED Defense Motion to Modify Bail. Defense counsel requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing and SPEEDY Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Status hearing scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 09:00 am. Hearing will be held IN-PERSON in Room 113 of the Safety Building.
SPEEDY Jury Trial scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Defense contacted the Court and State via email to reschedule Status hearing. 
NEW DATE: Status hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.
Clerk provided information to MCSO.

Additionally, Defense requested to address bail. State to comply with Victim notification. Clerk provided information to Victim Witness Advocate.
All previously ordered conditions of Bail remain.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in Court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Jacob Daniel Corr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**JUDGE FEISS AND ALL PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**

For reasons stated on the record, Court GRANTED Defense counsel's Motion to Modify Bail. Defense counsel requested time to review case with Defendant. Defendant also has Case 21CF142 pending in Branch 46. Case adjourned for Status hearing, Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 09:45 am. Defendant Kenneth C Love in court with Attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court took judicial notice of 18CF3724. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective T. Chapman. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Defense to be heard on bail on the next date. Case is adjourned to Branch 46.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a2c51eb2-8d2b-766b-a132-aa68081ac004  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for January 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Kenneth C Love in court with attorney Paige Aleece Styler.  Defendant Kenneth C Love in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kenneth C Love appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Feiss, Branch 46. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
